title: Hour 2: Jake Paul in the House!
description:
Kendrick Perkins, Domonique Foxworth, and Courtney Cronin discuss if they would rather see Kevin Durant play in the Eastern Conference or in the Western Conference. Louis Riddick joins the show to debate which former Alabama QB will have the best NFL season. Jake Paul stops by to discuss his upcoming fight with Hasim Rahman Jr. Stick around to hear the crew talk about whether Lamar Jackson or Kyler Murray was the biggest snub from the list of the top 10 NFL QBs.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 2: Jake Paul joins First Take.
